metadata.dc:author: Skromne Kadlubik, G
Sánchez, J L
Gutiérrez Quiroz, M
Cruz Nava, J
metadata.dc:description: Using the same technique that gave such good results in cysticercosis and other parasitic diseases we obtained antibodies labelled against trichinosis and proved their diagnostic value by scan in infected rats. These same antibodies at lethal dose, median, (LD50) radiolysed trichina larvae without damage to the animal. Experimental results are very encouraging and their potential use in human subjects are undergoing research in our laboratory and will be the object of a future report.
metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico y tratamiento de la triquinosis utilizando radionúclidos.
[Diagnosis and treatment of trichinosis by means of radionuclide].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
